title: [Massive] Strategies to Maximize Collaborative Learning Effectiveness in Virtual Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational scientific literacy and ability to utilize digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Course for senior scientific personnel in R&D departments to improve knowledge-sharing and collaborative capabilities.

learning_goals: Learners can improve knowledge-sharing efficiency among peers by 30% or more using collaborative learning strategies in virtual environments.
Participants demonstrate the ability to regulate cognitive conflict during task-solving processes based on interdependence without intergroup competition.

Learners will generate problem-solving outputs within one week for ≥2 of 3 scientific problems presented on an online platform, meeting creativity (≥4/5 scale), accuracy (data-verified), and practicality (explicit field applicability).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
